org.spf4j.base

Class BasicExecutionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.base.BasicExecutionContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, ExecutionContext, JsonWriteable, Writeable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProfiledExecutionContext

    @ThreadSafe
 @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public class BasicExecutionContext
extends Object
implements ExecutionContext
    The simplest execution context possible.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas
